name: Turn It On! (HeladoDePistacho)
description:
Turn it On! is a tiki puzzle game about energy transmission done by Global Game Jam 2018.

Light all the crystals to pass to the next level, and make sure to match the colors.

Have fun! :D

Instalation: Download the file below and execute TurnItOn.exe

Controls: Drag and drop the tikis with the mouse left click and rotate the camera with the right click.
